article_title: Soccer Star Tim Howard Credits Faith for Bringing Him Peace
article_text: American soccer goalie Tim Howard pointed beyond practice and talent to describe his success on the field. The 2014 World Cup star opened up about his faith yesterday on ABC News’ “This Week” to call his “relationship with Jesus Christ” a key to his life. He described his ability to play every day as a “blessing,” reinforcing his status as more than an American sports hero.
